mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Empowering Sri Lanka with intelligent geo-mapping solutions for sustainable rubber development and EUDR compliance
mission.vision: To become Sri Lanka's leading geo-mapping platform, transforming how the rubber industry approaches sustainability, compliance, and agricultural innovation.

focusAreas.title: Agriculture Monitoring
focusAreas.description: Advanced monitoring of rubber plantations and crop areas to prevent unauthorized encroachment and optimize yield management across Sri Lanka's agricultural regions.

focusAreas.title: Flood Management
focusAreas.description: Real-time flood risk assessment and early warning systems to protect rubber cultivation areas and surrounding communities from monsoon-related damages.

focusAreas.title: Land Protection
focusAreas.description: Comprehensive land use mapping and protection protocols to preserve valuable agricultural land and maintain sustainable rubber production practices.

focusAreas.title: Urban Planning
focusAreas.description: Strategic integration of agricultural zones with urban development plans to balance economic growth with environmental sustainability.

coreValues.title: Sustainability
coreValues.description: Environmental stewardship drives every decision we make, ensuring rubber production preserves Sri Lanka's natural heritage.

coreValues.title: Innovation
coreValues.description: Cutting-edge technology and data analytics revolutionize traditional agricultural practices for maximum efficiency.

coreValues.title: Transparency
coreValues.description: Complete visibility into supply chains and farming practices builds trust with global partners and ensures compliance.

challenges.title: Legacy Systems
challenges.description: Outdated mapping infrastructure and manual record-keeping processes that limit accuracy and real-time data access across rubber plantations.
challenges.solution: Modern cloud-based geo-mapping platform with automated data collection and real-time synchronization capabilities.

challenges.title: Limited Data Access
challenges.description: Fragmented information systems that prevent stakeholders from accessing comprehensive plantation data and compliance metrics.
challenges.solution: Centralized dashboard providing 24/7 access to all stakeholders with role-based permissions and mobile compatibility.

challenges.title: Data Inconsistency
challenges.description: Inconsistent data formats and collection methods across different regions leading to unreliable reporting and decision-making.
challenges.solution: Standardized data collection protocols with automated validation and quality control mechanisms.

challenges.title: Scalability Issues
challenges.description: Existing systems unable to handle the growing demands of Sri Lanka's expanding rubber industry and increasing regulatory requirements.
challenges.solution: Scalable cloud infrastructure designed to grow with industry needs and accommodate increasing data volumes.

challenges.title: EUDR Compliance Gaps
challenges.description: Difficulty in meeting European Union Deforestation Regulation requirements due to inadequate traceability and documentation systems.
challenges.solution: Comprehensive traceability system with blockchain-verified supply chain documentation and automated compliance reporting.

challenges.title: Environmental Monitoring
challenges.description: Limited capability to monitor environmental impact and implement sustainable practices across rubber cultivation areas.
challenges.solution: Integrated environmental monitoring with satellite imagery, soil analysis, and carbon footprint tracking capabilities.
